item.title: Palia Releasing New Update for May 2024
item.description:
Highlights

  • Palia update 0.180, "Crafted Comforts Update," launches May 28 with new housing, chat bubbles, and more customizations.
  • New features include Friendship level 5 quests, Black Market Hotpot, and Premium Store items like pets and tool skins.
  • Developers are improving Palia's economy, raising limits for Gold and Renown, and enhancing reward and resource drops.

Palia developer Singularity 6 revealed update 0.180, also known as the game's "Crafted Comforts Update," will be released before the end of the month. This new Palia update brings several new features to the community simulation game, including new housing options, chat bubbles, and much more.

Singularity 6's Palia is developed in Unreal Engine and set in a unique high fantasy world. Palia players can explore this vibrant world with their friends, fish and farm together, build their new homes, and unravel mysteries about an ancient human civilization. Although the game is still in open beta with many content updates to come, Palia received a Nintendo Switch version this past December, and the Steam version launched on March 25 this year. Currently, the Palia developers are working toward a version 1.0 release and gathering feedback in order to fix the game's lingering issues and improve the features that are available right now.

Related
Palia: How to Fulfill Player Requests

Players can request items in Palia that other players can fulfill. Here's how you can fulfill the requests of others.

The official Palia Twitter account released a new teaser trailer for update 0.180, revealing that the new update will arrive on May 28. The new update will introduce new housing options, building blocks, and pathways and walkways, giving players more customization features for their home spaces. Players can also expect more Friendship level 5 quests, which delve deeper into the lives of fan-favorite NPCs in the world of Palia . Players can unlock these quests by giving gifts to certain Palia residents . Moreover, update 0.180 brings chat bubbles and a Black Market Hotpot for friends to enjoy together.

Palia Update 0.180 Adds New Content and Features

  • Launches May 28
  • Includes:
    • New housing options
    • Building blocks
    • Pathways and walkways
    • Friendship level 5 quests
    • Chat bubbles
    • Black Market Hotpot
    • Economy changes
    • New Premium Store items

As shown in the teaser trailer, Palia will receive new items in the Premium Store, including pets and tool skins. The game's official Steam page also confirms that patch notes for Palia update 0.180 will be released soon with in-depth details on what will be changed or added on May 28. Thus far, Singularity 6 confirmed that the in-game economy of Palia will receive changes, so players can expect limits for Gold and Renown to be raised. This change also means that reward and resource drops will be improved for a better quality of life going forward. Update 0.180 is expected to make more improvements based on feedback from April 2024's Palia update and subsequent hotfix.

Palia update 0.180 aims to be one of the game's biggest updates to date, and the excitement is spreading within the player community on Twitter. Many Palia fans are excited about the return of Hotpot, while others are looking forward to having more customization options for their homes and surrounding areas. Players new to the world of Palia can reap the benefits of the update since the economy and quality-of-life changes mean the overall experience is more rewarding.

item.title: Elden Ring Nendoroid Figure Makes the Vagabond Class Adorable
item.description:
Highlights

  • Vagabond Class from Elden Ring turned into cute Nendoroid collectible for fans to pose and enjoy.
  • Despite dark world, players can now collect adorable Vagabond Nendoroid with articulated parts and accessories.

The Vagabond Class from Elden Ring is getting turned into a Nendoroid collectible, and it's adorable. The chibi-style action figures shrink down popular characters from various games, anime, media franchises, and Elden Ring , and come with a number of articulated parts and swappable pieces so that fans can create poses or recreate iconic moments.

Elden Ring isn't exactly known for being cute. While players have developed a fondness for certain characters, the world is dark, dismal, and extremely lethal for the player. Players set out on a number of potential starting classes, including Vagabond, in an effort to conquer the foes set out before them. Despite the grim nature of Elden Ring and its DLC, Shadow of the Erdtree looking even darker, fans can now collect a cute version of the Vagabond class.

Related
Kai Cenat Reveals His Next 7 Game Marathons After Elden Ring

Days after finishing Elden Ring, Twitch streamer Kai Cenat reveals his upcoming game marathon schedule to his followers.

Elden Ring 's Vagabond Nendoroid is officially available for order now. The heavily stylized Nendoroid has been made in the same style as the prior Ranni Elden Ring Nendoroid, so fans can easily pose them together. The Vagabond is in its usual starting gear, with short stubby legs and arms and a partially obscured face. Like most Nendoroids, this one comes with additional pieces, including a calm face, shouting face, longsword, Heater Shield, torch, Flask of Crimson Tears, and a stand to place it on.

While not included, the Vagabond Nedoroid can also interact with some of the prior Elden Ring Nendoroid accessories, including Ranni's Dark Moon Greatsword and Alexander's Jar Bairn . The figure is just shy of four inches in height and will cost $50.99 before shipping. The product is expected to ship in the first quarter of 2025, and if purchased from the Good Smile Store, it will also come with a limited acrylic stand emblazened with "YOU DIED" text, allowing the player to recreate their worst failures in Elden Ring .

Stirring Up Excitement for Elden Ring

While this cute style might not be something every fan of Elden Ring is interested in, chances are most fans of the title are extremely excited for the game's DLC. While the game is set to only have one DLC release, players are looking forward to exploring the Land of Shadow . With new weapons, equipment, and abilities to discover, players will likely be tinkering with and finding the best builds for months following its release. There's not long now to wait for its launch, so players looking forward to this Nendoroid should have some exciting in-game moments to tide them by until it ships.

item.title: Battlefield 2042 Releases New Update
item.description:
Highlights

  • EA and DICE continue to support Battlefield 2042 with updates and new content.
  • Update 7.2.1 for Battlefield 2042 includes a number of fixes for issues players have been encountering in the game.
  • Battlefield 2042 is introducing the new Strike Team mode in the upcoming Future Strike event as well.

Battlefield 2042 has released a new update, addressing several issues in the game. Since its launch in 2021, Battlefield 2042 has faced numerous challenges, from a bug-filled release to a dwindling player base. Despite these setbacks, EA and DICE have continuously worked to improve the game through regular updates and new content, striving to meet the expectations of their dedicated fan base.

EA recently confirmed that Battlefield 2042 â€™s Season 7 will be its last , marking the end of a roller-coaster journey for the game. Initially plagued by bugs and low player numbers, the developers attempted to revitalize the game with seasonal updates that introduced new maps, modes, and weapons. With Season 7 well underway, EA is now shifting its focus to future projects in the Battlefield series, bringing in Motive Studio to help shape the franchise's next chapter.

Related
Best Assault Rifles In Battlefield 2042, Ranked

Assault rifles in Battlefield 2042 are some of the most powerful weapons in the game. Here are the best of the best among them.

Update 7.2.1 for Battlefield 2042 was released on May 22 and addressed several minor issues reported by players. Key improvements include resolving an out-of-bounds issue with the character Mackay on the Redacted map, adjusting jet spawns on Kaleidoscope for safer flight paths, and fixing scope attachment functionality for the Penguins on Battlefield Portal servers. Additionally, texturing issues on the Deep Blue King weapon cosmetic for the M5A3 and low-detail scopes on Xbox One and PlayStation 4 have been corrected.

Alongside these updates, Battlefield 2042 â€™s upcoming Future Strike event , which is set to run from May 28 to June 10, will introduce the new Strike Team mode. This mode, featuring 4v4 and 8v8 gameplay, allows players only one life per round and incorporates unique elements such as redeploying as recon drones after being eliminated. The event promises new cosmetic items and continues EA's effort to enrich the gameâ€™s final season with engaging content.

As Battlefield 2042 concludes its final season, discussions are intensifying around the future direction of the Battlefield franchise. One of the most intriguing aspects of 2042 was its near-futuristic setting, which introduced sci-fi elements in its characters, weapons, and equipment. However, despite its potential, the gameâ€™s execution failed to meet fan expectations, particularly due to its lack of advanced technology and a single-player campaign to explore its dystopian world. Given the controversy and mixed reception, the next Battlefield game might get rid of 2042 's most intriguing aspect to create a fresh and compelling experience.

In addition to these potential changes, reports suggest that the next Battlefield installment could feature a free-to-play Battle Royale mode , developed by Ripple Effect. This mode aims to compete in the crowded Battle Royale market by offering a standalone experience, unlike Battlefield 5 â€™s Firestorm. As EA and DICE plan their next steps, the lessons learned from Battlefield 2042 â€™s rocky journey could be crucial in shaping a game that can reestablish the franchise's position at the forefront of the FPS genre. With the largest development team in Battlefield â€™s history working on the new project, expectations are high for a successful revival.

Battlefield 2042 Update #7.2.1

CHANGELOG

General Improvements

  • Resolved an issue which allowed Mackay to get out of bounds on Redacted.
  • Adjusted jet spawns on Kaleidoscope to ensure a safer flight path entry.
  • Resolved an issue which allowed the Penguins to use scope attachments on weapons such as the SWS-10 on Battlefield Portal servers whilst this functionality was disabled.
  • Resolved an issue which resulted in some scopes having a low level of detail on previous Xbox One and PlayStationÂ®4 whilst inspecting them in third perspective.
  • Resolved a texturing issue on the Deep Blue King weapon cosmetic for the M5A3.
  • Class Distribution Indicators on the deployment screen when choosing a class should now correctly display the amount of individuals for each class.

item.title: Fortnite Reveals More Skins Coming in Chapter 5 Season 3
item.description:
Highlights

  • Fortnite teases new Mad Max-inspired skins in upcoming Chapter 5 Season 3 update. Driveable battle bus also returning to map.
  • Exciting collaboration with Monster Jam brings mayhem and Mad Max-style vehicles to the island in new update.
  • Scheduled downtime on May 24 for the release of Wrecked theme, including vehicles with equippable weapons. Sandstorm incoming.

Fortnite has revealed more skins through key art released on May 23. Fortnite has an upcoming major update in Chapter 5 Season 3, starting May 24. The new seasonâ€™s overall theme seems to be a Mad Max -style post-apocalyptic setting.

Fortnite recently had a promotional collaboration with Monster Jam, revealing a teaser trailer for the upcoming season. In the trailer, a sandstorm covers the island, bringing mayhem and Mad Max -style vehicles from a vault that resemble jaws. Inside the sandstorm in Fortnite is apparently a massive boat, which has a red light shining through the storm. The light blinks in morse code, â€œno hope,â€ which has appeared since the live event that took place on May 16.

Related
Fortnite Festival Getting Important Update Soon

The Rock Band-like Fortnite Festival game mode is set to receive an important update in the near future.

Fortnite dropped a new piece of key art on its Twitter account, detailing several new skins that could be coming in the next season. Among them are a new Bright Bomber skin, a peapod-like skin, Magneto, and several other skins wearing Mad Max -style armor. A driveable battle bus is also included in the key art, revealing its return to the map. The reveal of Magneto confirms a leak from Hypex on Twitter that more Marvel collabs in Fortnite will be featured .

Fortnite Reveals Several New Skins in Key Art

The name of Chapter 5 Season 3 is Wrecked, and it comes with a dusty post-apocalyptic theme. When asked, the Epic Games vice president described the theme in a tweet with the word "Nitro.â€ Later, certain Fortnite creators received toy cars with a license plate reading "EAT NTRO," echoing the vice president's teaser. Vehicles with equippable weapons are also confirmed to be coming to the game.

The new Fortnite s eason is expected to come after scheduled downtime at 2 AM Eastern Time on May 24, 2024. Matchmaking is to be disabled around 1:30 AM Eastern Time on May 24, 2024. Players will not be able to take part in online play after this time, so Fortnite fans should try and finish their Battle Passes before then. The update is expected to come with a collaboration with Fallout , after the Fortnite Twitter account teased the T-60 Power Armor coming to the game.

Certain POIs in Fortnite are expected to be removed , with Mount Olympus, Ruined Reels, Fencing Fields, and The Underworld getting cut. Itâ€™s currently unknown why these regions will disappear from the island. However, the sandstorm approaching may have something to do with it. In the Fallout teaser, the POI Snooty Stepps appears to be affected by sand, which seems to be one of several locations being changed by the update.

item.title: Amazon Prime Gaming Members Can Claim a New Call of Duty Bundle
item.description:
Highlights

  • Amazon Prime subscribers can claim the new Carbon Dated bundle for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone until June 20.
  • The bundle includes Mesozoic - RAM-7 Assault Rifle Weapon Blueprint, Extinction - Longbow Blueprint, Fossil Record Charm, and Dino-mite Vinyl.
  • Season 4 of Call of Duty is coming with changes like new gulag variants in Warzone and possible future cosmetic drops like Gundam x Call of Duty.

A new weapon bundle for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 is available to Amazon Prime subscribers through Prime Gaming. Activision often teams up with Amazon to offer players equipment drops across Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and the battle royale game, Warzone .

The last weapon drop was back in April when players could claim the Electron Energy bundle for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone . That included several new weapons and a new blueprint. The latest Prime freebie follows a similar vein to last monthâ€™s drop but with a few differences.

Related
Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Gets Shocking First Teaser

The upcoming Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 gets a surprising teaser, showcasing the first details about the next entry in the popular FPS franchise.

The drop is titled the Carbon Dated bundle and is available to players subscribed to Amazon Prime Gaming . So long as players link their Prime subscription to an active Activision account, they can claim the bundle up to June 20. The offer is available across all platforms and includes Mesozoic - RAM-7 Assault Rifle Weapon Blueprint and Extinction - Longbow Blueprint, each featuring a fossilized dinosaur look. Rounding out the set is the Fossil Record Charm and a Dino-mite Vinyl, which can be added to the playerâ€™s loadouts for additional flare.

Items in Prime Gaming's New Call of Duty Bundle

  • Mesozoic - RAM-7 Assault Rifle Weapon Blueprint
  • Extinction - Longbow Blueprint
  • Fossil Record - Charm
  • Dino-mite - Vinyl

The Prime Gaming bundle has launched as Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone are about to enter Season 4 . The latest update is scheduled to land on May 29 and bring about a wealth of changes to the battle royale game, such as significant changes to the Urzikstan gulag that includes the introduction of new silo variants, and the complete removal of the Ashika Island map. The Ashika map has been part of Call of Duty â€™s online rotations since 2023 but is being phased out in favor of a more streamlined playlist rotation.

Fans of Modern Warfare 3 may also be in for a larger cosmetic drop coming with Season 4. Rumors have been circulating about a Gundam x Call of Duty crossover , with the popular Call of Duty news reporter CharlieIntel providing leaked artwork. While nothing has been confirmed, speculation in the community is that this crossover will appear in the coming months.

Looking past the Carbon Dated bundle, The Call of Duty franchise is gearing up for its next big announcement. Activision will unveil Call of Duty Black Ops 6 on June 9 , immediately after the Xbox presentation held by Microsoft. Little is known about the title but it is rumored that Black Ops 6 could be the first Call of Duty to launch on Game Pass from day one.
